Definition at line 409 of file v4e_api.h.

typedef int receive_nal_callback_t(void *context, media_sample_t *ms)

Application-provided callback function to receive ready NAL units immediately.

Application is responsible to release media sample, immediately or later, using "v4_free_media_sample()". Note, that in multi-threading mode this function should not perform any time-consuming actions. It is recommended to store NAL unit for further processing and return control as soon as possible.

Parameters:
context - application-provided context pointer;
ms - next media sample, NULL means "end of stream" situation;
Returns:
return value is ignored;

Definition at line 53 of file v4e_api.h.

typedef int release_raw_frame_callback_t(void *context, void *frame)

Application-provided callback functions to release raw_frame or vp_raw_frame to be called asynchronously when raw frame is not used any more.

Parameters:
context - application-provided context pointer;
frame - pointer to raw_frame_t or vp_raw_frame_t depending on what input was used it is caller responisibility to supply proper release callback
Returns:
return value is ignored;

Definition at line 40 of file v4e_api.h.
